title: PS3 leikir (Q4 2008)
text:
Helstu PS3 leikir “Q4 2008”:
(skv.
Eurogamer.net
+
Gamespot.com
)
SOCOM: Confrontation
LEGO Batman
BioShock
Saints Row 2
Dead Space
Far Cry 2
LittleBigPlanet
Eternal Sonata
Midnight Club Los Angeles
Fallout 3
Legendary
Valkyria Chronicles
Guitar Hero World Tour
Motorstorm: Pacific Rift
Tom Clancy's EndWar
Call of Duty: World at War
Mirror's Edge
PES 2009
Mortal Kombat vs. DS Universe
Need for Speed Undercover
Tomb Raider: Underworld
Alone in the Dark: Inferno
Resistance 2
Naruto: Ultimate Ninja Storm
Rise of the Argonauts

World in Conflict: Soviet Assault

Prototype

Velvet Assassin
Destroy All Humans! Path of the Furon
The Chronicles of Riddick: Assault on Dark Athena
The Legend of Spyro: Dawn of the Dragon
Ghostbusters: The Video Game
………………
Ættum ekki að kvarta yfir leikjaskorti !
Hvaða leikir heilla mest, hverjir heilla ekkert og hverjir eru must-buy að þínu mati ?

replies.text: Fallout er eini leikurinn sem ég mun pottþétt kaupa

LittleBigPlanet, Fallout3 og Call of Duty: World at War
langar mér í af þessum lista :D
